TopicTitle: Space Sphere from Portal to Kerbal

Articles.Content:
Little idea I had for Steam Workshop integration celebration mod (If it ever happened)

"After being flung out of Skyrim, Space Sphere found himself floating to Kerbol-system, where he was picked up by odd little race called the Kerbals. His wide knowledge of space impressed Kerbals and they decided he would be a valuable asset to the team."

*Insert Six Million Dollar Man opening here*
That picture loaded in beautifully - appeared to be a regular sphere from Portal and then BANG - he's in space (gotta go to space). Love it.

Wow. I scrolled down and it just smacked me in the face.

Nice, sir.
"What's your favorite thing about space? Mine is snacks. I MEAN SPACE."
